docs.snippet: N.B.A. Commissioner Adam Silver juggled a thrilling game between the Nets and the Heat at Barclays Center with the latest Donald Sterling bonfire....
docs.lead_paragraph: N.B.A. Commissioner Adam Silver juggled a thrilling game between the Nets and the Heat at Barclays Center with the latest Donald Sterling bonfire.
docs.abstract: Harvey Araton On Pro Basketball column argues that the NBA postseason has been thrilling even as fallout continues from scandal surrounding Donald Sterling's ownership of the Los Angeles Clippers; notes that dramatic victory by the Miami Heat over the Brooklyn Nets came just in time to offset latest offensive comments from Sterling and efforts by commissioner Adam Silver to end his ownership.

headline.main: A Postseason Full of Spotlights, Some Glaring
headline.print_headline: A Postseason Full of Spotlights, Some Glaring

docs.snippet: Marcin Gortat and John Wall combined for 58 points as Washington romped at Indiana to force a Game 6 in the series....
docs.lead_paragraph: Marcin Gortat and John Wall combined for 58 points as Washington romped at Indiana to force a Game 6 in the series.
docs.abstract: NBA Roundup; Washington Wizards beat Indiana Pacers, 102-79, cutting their deficit in the Easter Conference semifinals to 3-2; other basketball news noted.

headline.main: Controlling The Boards, The Wizards Remain Alive

docs.abstract: Brooklyn Nets, facing elimination in Game 5 of playoff series against the Miami Heat, have struggled with their shooting performance in the fourth quarter.
